pages.text: An imperfect ritual that removes anvil repair costs from tools and weapons. This ritual resets the accumulated repair penalty, making expensive items repairable again.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Bookshelf on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 3000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual has no persistent effect - it activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)1. Hold the item you want to reset$(br)2. Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone$(br)3. The item's RepairCost tag will be removed$(br)4. The stone remains for future use$(br2)$(bold)Applications:$()$(li)Reset anvil penalties$(li)Make items repairable again$(li)Prepare items for enchanting$(br2)$(italic)Turn back the clock on your tools.$()
